verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] [ARG1: stroganoff] i 've been preparing stroganoff in the slow cooker for more than 20 years once you 've done it this way you 'll never cook it on the stovetop again it great for family or company —karen herbert placerville california toh
